subject: Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Zach Tomaselli’s lawyer said he had withdrawn a lawsuit against the former Syracuse assistant basketball coach Bernie Fine, whom two former ball boys accuse of molesting them.
snippet: Zach Tomaselli’s lawyer said he had withdrawn a lawsuit against the former Syracuse assistant basketball coach Bernie Fine, whom two former ball boys accuse of molesting them.
